entry.title: Taza Natural Eye & Neck Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Face Treatments
Price: 20.79 - 25.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Eye & Neck Cream Contains: Powerful anti aging peptides: Haloxyl, Matrixyl 3000. Our Eye Cream is made from some of the most natural and mild ingredients. It has a lavishly rich & creamy texture and has been specifically formulated to be light and absorb fast.

  • 99% Natural • Unscented • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Sulphates • Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive
  • Contains Haloxyl which reduces dark circles under the eyes by flushing pigmented blood which appears as dark circles under the eyes
  • Contains Matrixyl 3000 known for the anti-aging peptides that assist in creating new collagen
  • Contains Calendula Extract which helps to soothe the delicate under the eye skin and helps to reduce the look of puffiness and dark circles
  • Contains Wheat Germ Oil which is rich in natural Vitamins A, B, D, and E. The rich vitamin E content in this oil helps eliminate the signs of aging, including wrinkles and skin sagging, by strengthening the skin’s connective tissues

We also suggest you boost the effects of this Taza Eye & Neck Cream by incorporating the Taza Natural Tri-Peptide Serum into your skincare regime to combine 3 powerful extracts: Guarana, Matrixyl 3000, and Haloxyl to combat dark circles, under eye bags, and puffiness.

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural Eye & Neck Cream to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

This cream is a must have for your Taza skincare collection. Get your Taza Natural Eye & Neck Cream.

entry.title: Taza Natural Tri-Peptide Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc. (CAN)
Type: Face Treatments
Price: 21.99 - 27.49 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Tri-Peptide Serum includes a phytosteroid complex of Wild Yam and Soya for even more firming and wrinkle reduction. This serum also contains Guarana, a plant from Brazil, that contains xanthine alkaloids (theophylline, caffeine, theobromine), recognized to tone, stimulate blood vessels and eliminate excess fatty tissue, making this serum especially good for under the eyes and for the neck as well.

  • 98% Natural • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Sulphates • Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive
  • Contains Guaraná (a shrub native to the Brazilian Amazon) whcih helps reduce puffiness around the eyes and excess fat under the chin and neck areas
  • Contains Wild Yams which acts as a natural peptide. It is also a powerful anti-inflammatory that helps speed tissue regeneration resulting in normalization of damaged skin
  • Contains Acqua Biomin, which are ocean minerals containing high concentrations of selenium, magnesium, copper, zinc, calcium, and germanium. These ocean minerals are also found in the skin and over time are depleated through daily environmental exposure. Through application of this ingredient these necessary minerals are replaced in the skin
  • Contains Soy Extract which includes soy isoflavones that are the most potent of the antioxidant phytoestrogens; this extract supports elasticity and firmness in the skin, helping keep skin soft and flexible as is needed when rebuilding damaged collagen

We suggest that you use the Taza Natural Seaplex Anti-Aging Facial Cream over this serum to enhance the anti-aging and firming effects on your skin. Also adding Taza Natural Eye & Neck Cream with these products will enhance the anti aging effects around the eyes, as it combines extracts like Haloxyl, Matrixyl 3000 and Guarana to combat dark circles, under eye bags, and puffiness.

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Taza Natural Tri-Peptide Serum to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Get your Taza Natural Tri-Peptide Serum.

entry.title: Taza Natural Vitamin C Anti-Aging Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Face Treatments
Price: 14.39 - 17.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Vitamin C Anti-Aging Serum is a 100% natural multifunctional serum which performs as an exfoliant, anti-oxidant, and skin agent with anti-aging properties. This is an intensive Vitamin C facial product that helps to moisturize and diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. This product contains: Ethyl Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Hyaluronic Acid (HA), Fruit Acids (Alpha Hydroxy Acid). The following are benefits of these ingredients:

  • The Ethyl Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C): Is an effective and stable skin brightening agent • Balances skin tone • Prevents photo-aging and reduces dark/age spots and skin blotches • Increases collagen synthesis to smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles • Has excellent anti-oxidation properties.
  • The Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Improves skin's elasticity with anti-wrinkle properties • Enhances barrier function preventing skin from losing water content • Helps discoloration and uneven skin tone • Stimulates microcirculation in the dermis.
  • The Hyaluronic Acid (HA) , naturally found in the body, secures moisture and creates fullness— youthful skin by improving its moisture content. As the skin ages, HA decreases. Hyaluronic Acid: Has a slight plumping effect to even wrinkles • Is a necessary element for maintaining youthful skin • improves collagen production • Brightens skin tone, reducing dullness.
  • The Fruit Acids are derived from grapes, apples, lemons, oranges and sugar cane. These acids act as a natural Alpha Hydroxy Acid. It helps: to stimulate both elastin and collagen production • to improve appearance of photo damaged skin • performs as a mild exfoliant and peel (unlike glycolic or salicylic acid) • good for sensitive skin.

This Vitamin C serum has no parabens, no phthalates and no sulphates. Additionally, this product is suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive.

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural Vitamin C Anti-Aging Serum to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Get your Taza Natural Vitamin C Anti-Aging Serum.

entry.title: Taza Natural Seaplex Anti-Aging Facial Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Day Creams
Price: 16.79 - 20.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Seaplex Anti-Aging Cream contains: Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Grapeseed Extract, Wild Mushroom Extract, Japanese Green Tea Extract, and Cucumber Extract. The following are benefits of these ingredients:

  • The Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil, and Grapeseed Extract softens, moisturizes, hydrates, lubricates, and promotes skin elasticity. The Avocado Oil is packed full of vitamins A, B, D, E, protein, amino acids, all of which benefits our skin's health; this ingredient is also known as a super food for the skin.
  • The Grapeseed Oil helps to eliminate acne, tighten skin, moisturize, and minimize aging. The Shea Butter moisturizes, reduces inflammation, boosts collagen for anti-aging, promotes elasticity, and replenishes and protects the skin's moisture barrier.
  • The Vitamin E helps skin look younger by reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
  • The Grapeseed Extract is rich in flavonoids and phytochemicals, which have antioxidant properties like Vitamin C and Vitamin E. These antioxidants are believed to prevent and control numerous ailments by safeguarding skin cells against the ravages of unstable oxygen molecules called free radicals, which are known to damage the skin.
  • The Wild Mushroom Extract tightens and tones the skin.
  • The Japanese Green Tea Extract has a strong antioxidant effect, which also protects the skin from the damaging effect of free radicals. Green tea extract also contains methylxanthines that stimulates skin microcirculation and therefore positively influence the tone and health of the skin; this ingredient also reduces puffiness and dark circles around the eyes, slows and visibly reverses the look and signs of aging, and protects the skin against the abuse of the elements. 
  • The Cucumber Extract contains various minerals including magnesium, potassium, and silica. Silica can help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and minimize the appearance of pores. 

This anti-aging cream is 99% natural; moreover, it has no parabens, no phthalates, and no sulphates. Additionally, this product is suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive.

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural Seaplex Anti-Aging Cream to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Get your Taza Natural Seaplex Anti-Aging Cream.

entry.title: Taza Natural Dead Sea Mud Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Face Treatments
Price: 21.99 - 27.49 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Dead Sea Mud Mask improves the appearance of your facial skin by promoting elasticity and minimizing pores, wrinkles and lines. When the mud dries on your face, toxins that may be present in your skin cells from your everyday diet and the environment are drawn out. Your face will feel clean and refreshed.

This mask also improves the texture of your facial skin, purifies the skin by removing dirt, and tightens and tones the skin. Moreover, it replenishes and protects the skin’s moisture barrier. All this will make your facial skin bright and radiant and youthful looking. The following are additional features of this mud mask:

  • 99% Natural • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Gluten • No Sulphates • Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive
  • Application of the Dead Sea Mud removes toxins and impurities from your skin, tightens and tones your complexion, and improves blood circulation to aid in cell regeneration
  • Contains Shea Butter which assists the anti-aging process by boosting your skin's collagen production and with Vitamin E reduces wrinkles, fine lines, and skin sagging for a younger looking appearance; Shea Butter also forms a protective barrier over your skin to hold in moisture and effectively relieves dry itchy skin. Also contains Glycerin, a humectant, that attracts moisture in the air to your skin
  • Contains Grapeseed Oil which helps to eliminate acne in addition to tightening and moisturizing the skin, and minimizing skin aging
  • Contains Papaya Extract which has Vitamin A and C. Vitamin A is a natural exfoliant that repairs the skin by increasing rate of new cell formation. Vitamin C is an anti-oxidant with wonderful proteins for smoother softer skin

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural Dead Sea Mud Mask to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Taza Natural Botanical Extract Firming Facial Toner has moisturizing properties which help keep the skin hydrated. With an infusion of botanical extracts this toner nourishes and energizes the skin. These extracts help skin appear firmer and pores look tighter and more refined.

This toner.contains: Tamarind Seed Extract, Chamomile Extract, Aloe Leaf Juice, Cucumber Extract, and Japanese Green Tea Extract. It  The following are benefits of these ingredients:

  • The Chamomile Extract eases the itching of eczema and other rashes and reduces skin inflammation, is also speeds healing and prevents bacterial infection.
  • The Cucumber Extract contains various minerals including magnesium, potassium, and silica. Silica can help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It also helps minimize the appearance of pores.
  • The Aloe Leaf Juice Extract moisturizes the skin and reduces flaking and restores suppleness to enhance the appearance of dry or damaged skin. This extract removes wrinkles and gives the skin a healthier and younger looking appearance. It is a large resource of Vitamin E which reduces the damage to the skin caused by continuous itching. Sun burns can also be treated by using skin care products made of pure Aloe Vera Juice Extract. This ingredient is also used for treating acne problems, dryness of the skin, and any other type of skin problem.
  • The Japanese Green Tea Extract has a strong antioxidant effect, which also protects the skin from the damaging effect of free radicals. This extract also contains methylxanthines that stimulates skin microcirculation and therefore positively influence the tone and health of the skin; this ingredient also reduces puffiness and dark circles around the eyes, slows and visibly reverses the look and signs of aging, and protects the skin against the abuse of the elements.

This toner has no parabens, no phthalates and no sulphates. Additionally, this product is suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive.
